data.description:
Bayre City at night is known for it´s roaring street-racing scene and network of fast open roads. If you are willing to risk your good night´s sleep, you are in for a ride. Starting from the bottom with your classic whip, you build reputation, wealth and speed as you go. Just remember you are not alone with your dream of more than 30 highly detailed, customizable vehicles and apparel. Get ready to light up the city together.

LIT is a multiplayer game that also has a storymode that you can complete. BayreCity is the biggest open map with 5+ areas: NorthBay/Downtown area, OldTown area, Hillside area, EagleMountain area and BayreCity Racetrack area. You can also find the BayreCity Dragway here. Other map called SanMimas takes a freeway through the mountains to the desert. Third map is called HorizonHills and can be accessed through quickplay with "FURY:Rampage" car or load the map with any car or roomname throught the old track editor tool found on the garage table near the sofas.

LIT has different activities with different rewards: Races you start on BayreCity intersections, Stunt jumps, DeliveryMissions(Rivals-mode enabled), 1 lap race at the BayreRacetrack, timeattack run up and down the Eagle-mountain(starts from the parkinglot edge), full 66 lap race at HorizonHillsSpeedway(min 2 player online, requires FURY-car), NoHesi-type action at the SanMimas freeway, Lowrider-cars with hydraulics, Driftcars and the most important feature to be able to freely roam around the city.

changelog.change_log: LIT v.1.251 Oct2  2024   -Added option to change rearview mirror quality   -Fixed typos and logic  in Leaderboards   -Minor other fixes.

LIT v.1.25 Oct1  2024   New bodymod for SidewinderPredatorGT700 -> PredatorGT700R convertible -New game mode: Where´s Mike? , where you hunt for NPC cars for reward  -NEW: Leaderboards for Total races won, BayreCityRacetrack lap time, MountainRun downhill and uphill   -Optimizations for better Quest2 performance    Bugs can be reported to ⁠⁠bug-reports channel if somethings off.

LIT v.1.24 Sept17  2024  NEW MOD for SalvaggioEZ4:  GLITZ KX-12 APEX VEKTOR  -Shadows setting in RealtimeLights menu (none, Basic, Max) -Added return to track function (5sec press Y-button) -Overhauled NPC cars.   -Claim your LIT 1 year anniversary gift from garage office.
NEW FREE MOD : Ferrutio x Glitz Sfarzo  -ThornRT car nose cone now separates after big crash impact and  can tilt front wheels in random angles.
Version 1.222 adds a new mod for Kreuzer called Glitz G-Spec. Free for all to activate from the garage vehicle nameplate.

Version 1.221 adds new vehicle called "Kalis Flair" you can find it from the + menu on the screen along other Kalis cars. Kalis Flair is a drift car so you can activate drift mode from the vehicle color/name plate menu.
Version 1.22 adds new environment called San Mimas, there you´ll find a no-hesi style freeway to drive throught the mountains into the desert and back again.
Fix for Thorn/Discotheque performance settings multiply with 0 bug.

Long awaited individual performance settings for all cars to fine tune vehicles. Also added fading control for car engine and sound effects, it can be found on Touch-controller right stud X axis while driving.
Vesion 1.203 added shortcut to race HorizonHills (need Fury to attend it). Fixed Sidewinder steering wheel. Other minor changes like limiting users per room to 10 as test.

Fixes for HorizonHills logic, now only 66 laps to complete the multiplayer race challenge and each lap everyone gets 200, winner scores 100k reward. New car mod Salvaggio:Glitz Nightshade, activate it from the color menu nametag.
-Fix Fury:Rampage fixup/boost features in BayreCity map
-Horizon HIlls 100 racing challenge added (you need Fury:Rampage and at least 2 online players to attend race)   -Fury:Rampage mod added  -Minor other fixes and additions
